channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Rensselyrics Fall Auditions | Sept. 9
item.description: Date: Tuesday, September 9, 2025 8:00 PM - 10:30 PM - Join the Rensselyrics for our Fall 2025 auditions! The process is easy- just prepare a verse and a chorus of any song you feel confident in, and that you feel best shows off your voice. You can learn more about the process here and also sign up for a slot if you are interested. Don’t hesitate to reach out to us with any questions!
item.author: Students

item.title: Trivia/Game Night | Sept. 5
item.description: Date: Friday, September 5, 2025 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM - Join Red & White for some Jeopardy style trivia and board games! There will be free snacks, drinks, prizes, and an ice cream sundae bar!
item.author: Students

item.title: Welcome Back, RPI Students!
item.description: We are excited to welcome you back to campus for another year of learning, discovery, and community at RPI. Whether you are returning or joining us for the first time, we are thrilled to see our campus come alive again with your energy, ideas, and contributions.
item.author: Students

item.title: Last Day To Make Meal Plan Changes is Sept. 5
item.description: Just a reminder to all students who have a residential meal plan that this Friday September 5, 2025 is the last day to request any decreases in your meal plans for the Fall 2025 semester. After Friday, you’ll only be able to increase it. Thank you!
item.author: Students

item.title: CCPD & GE Vernova Info Session | Sept. 9
item.description: GE Vernova will be on campus on Tuesday, September 9th for an info session. Come learn more about the company and available opportunities to work with them! Additional details are available in Handshake.
item.author: Students

item.title: RPI Finance Conference 2025 | Oct. 1 (Register by Sept. 22)
item.description: We’re excited to announce the second annual RPI Finance Conference on October 1, 2025. Come explore a curated lineup of interactive sessions designed to advance your professional skills and deepen your understanding of critical topics in higher education. From finance and data to leadership and AI, there’s something for every learner. The registration deadline is September 22, 2025.
item.author: Community

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “4 Steps to Effective Communication: Extended DISC” | Sept. 10
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, September 10, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - Our success, both personally and professionally, is largely determined by our ability to communicate effectively with a variety of people. In this workshop, participants will receive individualized Extended DISC reports (based on the completion of the Extended DISC questionnaire) that reflect both their “natural” and “adjusted” behavioral styles and learn strategies which promote successful interactions with others.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
